Text: I'm surprised why no one has commented, it's not a fake, but NO video, only a green screen, so basically useless. Happened same with Modern Family of that week.
Its not fake...If you are getting a green screen means your players are ancient. Try downloading the new pot player or MPC HC.
okay I'll check these options. I use VLC by the way. Thanks anyway.

Yeaaah..about that..VLC doesn't completely support 10 bit, with its nightly builds and all. If you want to get the best possible quality out of a 10 bit video, configure your MPC HC or kmplayer or pot player with madVR. Google it for a how to!
